code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ToDoList=_ref=>{let{title}=_ref;const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const[newTask,setNewTask]=useState('');const addTask=()=>{if(!newTask)return;setTasks([...tasks,{text:newTask,completed:false}]);setNewTask('');};const toggleTask=index=>{const newTasks=[...tasks];newTasks[index].completed=!newTasks[index].completed;setTasks(newTasks);};const deleteTask=index=>{const newTasks=tasks.filter((_,i)=>i!==index);setTasks(newTasks);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:newTask,onChange:e=>setNewTask(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addTask,children:"Add Task"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:tasks.map((task,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{style:{textDecoration:task.completed?'line-through':'none'},children:[task.text,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>toggleTask(index),children:"Toggle"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteTask(index),children:"Delete"})]},index))})]});};export default ToDoList;
